text: Thina Sibeke ubusuku nemini ukuba zibe yimiqondiso emibini, Saza kananjalo Sawenza waba mnyama umqondiso wobusuku lo gama Senze umqondiso wemini waba kukukhanya, khonâ€™ukuze nikwazi ukufuna iziBele eNkosini yenu, kwanokuba nikwazi ukubala inani leminyaka nokuba nomqaphela (wezinto). Ke kaloku Sinichazele yonke into ngengcaciso egcweleyo
